content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code bikin push
SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://budidatalake.dfs.core.windows.net/budidatalakefilesystem/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
        FORMAT = 'PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]


CREATE DATABASE DataExplorationDB 
                COLLATE Latin1_General_100_BIN2_UTF8


USE DataExplorationDB

CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE ContosoLake
WITH ( LOCATION = 'https://budidatalake.dfs.core.windows.net')


CREATE LOGIN data_explorer WITH PASSWORD = 'My Very Strong Password 1234!';


CREATE USER data_explorer FOR LOGIN data_explorer;
GO
GRANT ADMINISTER DATABASE BULK OPERATIONS TO data_explorer;
GO

SELECT
    TOP 100 *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
            BULK 'budidatalakefilesystem/NYCTripSmall.parquet',
            DATA_SOURCE = 'ContosoLake',
            FORMAT='PARQUET'
    ) AS [result]
